summary: Encapsulates a comprehensive interface for interacting with the AWS Lambda service, offering methods to create, read, update, and delete functions, aliases, versions, layers, event source mappings, permissions, concurrency settings, URLs, and tags, and to invoke functions, while handling response formatting and configuration details.
business_intent: Enable applications, scripts, or CI/CD pipelines to programmatically manage AWS Lambda resources, facilitating automated deployment, version control, scaling, and integration with other cloud services.
